original_title: マクロスF ギャラクシーライブ2021［リベンジ］
overview: Sheryl and Ranka return for their first solo concert in 11 years!  The Macross concert event of the year, Macross Frontier Galaxy Live 2021 "REVENGE", is coming to Makuhari Messe on Nov. 10, and it’s going to be live streamed worldwide! Starring May’n as Sheryl Nome and Megumi Nakajima as Ranka Lee, this is the first-ever concert of the two to be live streamed worldwide, so you surely don’t want to miss the excitement and unforgettable performances they have in store!
tagline: The two are still in the future! Listen to our song!!!
title: Macross Frontier Galaxy Live 2021 "REVENGE"
